articles.description: After facing 32 balls, in which he had scored 50 runs, Suryakumar Yadav said that he wasn't in the mood to execute big shots. On the very next delivery, he was dismissed by Kane Richardson.
articles.content: One of the finest batters in modern-day cricket at present, Suryakumar Yadav looked in full swing as India took on Australia in the warm-up match ahead of the start of the T20 World Cup 2022. Surya s… [+1929 chars]

articles.title: “GOAT response from a GOAT,” Twitterati reacts as Sachin Tendulkar gives his take on Mankading - FeatureCricket
articles.description: Fans on Twitter reacted after batting great Sachin Tendulkar gave his take on the mankading. They feel that his statement should be enough to silence all the criticism related to the rule of the game.
